title: In Wisconsin, natural resource management removes references to 'climate ' from the web site
subtitle: The DNR page in Wisconsin was wiped out from all uses of the word "climate" and changed to indicate a lack of consensus on man-made global warming in the scientific community.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The web page of the Ministry of Natural Resources of Wisconsin on the possible effects of climate change on the Great Lakes has been deleted from references to the word "climate."
